title: Self-assembled monolayer of poly(o-phenylenediamine)/silver core–shell hybrid-based enzyme-free impedimetric glucose sensor for blood samples
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26863-26872
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04766D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mukul Deo, Devleena Sahoo, Pradip Kar
A core–shell hybrid of poly(o-phenylenediamine)/silver was prepared by a simple single-step process and self-assembled on a glassy carbon electrode to design an enzyme-free impedimetric glucose sensor.
